title: Send weather alerts to your mobile phone with OpenWeatherMap and SIGNL4
author: Ron
readme:
Get weather alerts on your mobile phone via push, SMS or voice call.

This flow gets weather information every morning and sends out an alert to your [SIGNL4](https://www.signl4.com) on-call team.

For example you can send out weather alerts in case of freezing temperatures, snow, rain, hail storms, hot weather, etc. The flow also supports automatic alert resolution. So, for example if the temperature goes up again the alert is closed automatically in the app.

User cases:

  * Dispatch snow removal teams
  * Inform car dealers to protect the cars outside in case of hail storms
  * Set sails if there are high winds
  * And much more ...



![signl4n8n.gif](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/signl4_n8n_9e680d5f9b.gif)

Can be adapted easily to other weather warnings, like rain, hail storm, etc.
readme_zh:
通过推送通知、短信或语音电话在手机上接收天气警报。

此流程每日早晨获取天气信息，并向您的[SIGNL4](https://www.signl4.com)值班团队发送警报。例如，当出现冰冻低温、降雪、降雨、冰雹、高温等天气时，可触发警报发送。该流程还支持自动解除警报功能——比如当气温回升后，应用内警报将自动关闭。

典型应用场景：

* 调度除雪作业团队
* 冰雹预警时通知汽车经销商保护户外车辆
* 大风天气时调整船帆
* 以及更多可能性...

![signl4n8n.gif](https://n8niostorageaccount.blob.core.windows.net/n8nio-strapi-blobs-prod/assets/signl4_n8n_9e680d5f9b.gif)

可轻松适配其他天气预警类型（如暴雨、冰雹等）
